name: where-am-i
description: A geolocation web app with Node.js + TypeScript backend on AWS

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -c auto -n WEB,API "pnpm -C packages/web dev" "pnpm -C packages/api dev"
scripts.build:all: pnpm -C packages/web build && pnpm -C packages/api build
scripts.start: concurrently -c auto -n WEB,API "pnpm -C packages/web preview" "pnpm -C packages/api start"
scripts.test: pnpm --filter web test && pnpm --filter api test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter api test
